name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior BigData Engineer with 10+ years of experience building high-performance software solutions, adept in **Java**, **Python**, and **SQL**. Skilled in leveraging cloud services such as **AWS**, specifically with tools like **Glue**, **LakeFormation**, **S3**, **Kinesis**, **IAM**, and infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Helm**. Proven track record of driving projects with Agile methodologies and ensuring effective communication across cross-functional teams.

Expertise in developing cloud-native applications and implementing data engineering solutions that optimize workflows and enhance data accessibility. A strong proponent of best practices in secure and maintainable solution architecture, with extensive experience in compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Brings a solid understanding of microservices and event-driven architectures, coupled with a passion for building systems that deliver meaningful impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable data processing solutions leveraging **Python** and **SQL**, focusing on high-performance data ingestion and transformation from diverse sources including **AWS S3**, **Kinesis**, and **Glue** for optimized analytics in big data environments.
• Implemented and managed secure AWS services using **IAM** for user access control and **LakeFormation** for data governance to ensure compliance with industry standards.
• Utilized **Terraform** and **Helm** for infrastructure automation and orchestration, improving deployment times by **30%** and reducing manual errors in cloud resource management.
• Designed and executed ETL processes with **Python** and **AWS Glue**, enabling efficient data flows and accelerating time to insight for large data sets in various formats.
• Collaborated effectively within Agile teams, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project deliverables, resulting in meeting **95%** of project timelines.
• Created and maintained documentation and architecture artifacts, facilitating knowledge sharing and onboarding processes within the engineering team.
• Optimized performance and escalated issues critically in big data pipelines, resulting in a **20%** reduction in processing times for batch jobs over **6 months**.
• Developed integration and real-time data streaming solutions using **AWS Kinesis**, supporting analytics for transaction data and contents for multiple client applications.
• Participated in code reviews and mentorship programs, enhancing team capabilities and contributing to an overall improvement in code quality and performance across **80%** of projects.

Utilized **Python** and **SQL** to design and implement robust data ingestion and transformation processes, enhancing data reliability and accessibility across systems.

Employed **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) implementations, automating provisioning and management of cloud infrastructure, reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Communicated technical concepts effectively to stakeholders, ensuring alignment of data engineering solutions with business objectives to drive strategic insights.
